General.Name: Viking Line Abp
General.Description: Viking Line Abp, together with its subsidiaries, provides passenger and cargo carrier services. The company offers its services using seven vessels in the northern Baltic Sea and in the Gulf of Finland. Viking Line Abp was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Mariehamn, Finland.
